mainHero.title: defying open source, making free software
mainHero.subtitle: sustainable for all
mainHero.description: defiOS is a one-stop solution for open-source repository owners to convert their projects into DAOs and issue project native tokens that interested third parties can purchase and stake to prioritize fixes and features based on their requirements.

items.title: what would the internet look like if free software scaled with the same momentum as for-profit corporations?
items.description: tokenization guarantees a community that rallies around your project, helps it succeed, and spreads the word. easily ship the most important features and get compensated for that instantly. gone are the days of applying to grants, defiOS makes the whole process seemless

items.title: companies leveraging open-source software no longer have to do it without paying a fair price
items.description: defiOs allows companies and users to buy and stake the relevant DAOs tokens on issues/features they want to see prioritized. the higher the reward, the more likely those issues are solved, features are shipped, letting the free markets incentivize developer activity directly. the internet runs on open-source software, but how do you scale and profit from it? defiOS solves this problem and allows developers to not only scale their open-source projects, but leverage different incentive models to ensure they can compete and out-perform private companies.

features.title: defiOS ❤️ open source
features.subtitle: the software we use everyday should open-source.
features.description: being able to read the code our everyday software uses, making sure there aren't any malicious code, and how our data is used, all of these things should be our top priorities. unfortunately, the internet has evolved to reward closed-source private players. defiOS enables developers to create and maintain great software, whilst ensuring they can scale and profit from its success.
